original_text: Because that, when they knew God, they glorified him not as God, neither were thankful; but became vain in their imaginations, and their foolish heart was darkened.
korean_text: 하나님을 알되 하나님을 영화롭게도 아니하며 감사하지도 아니하고 오히려 그 생각이 허망하여지며 미련한 마음이 어두워졌나니

sentences.original_text: Because that, when they knew God,
they glorified him not as God,
but became vain in their imaginations,
and their foolish heart was darkened.
